ThingsCamp 5

ThingsCamp 5 in Birmingham is over! We'll be writing about it soon.

As more and more gets connected to the internet, our digital lives have more possibilities, wider implications and greater risks than ever before. Find out more.

ThingsCamp 4

UWE

Everyone at ThingsCamp would like to thank UWE for their support; as a top level sponsor they’re really helping to make ThingsCamp happen. We’re grateful for their specific support which has enabled us to provide catering, venue and marketing for the event, and for the in-kind contribution of some staff and students whose enthusiasm has been invaluable to initiating the event in Bristol.

Our New Website

We’ve just launched our new website as a resource for everyone who wants to attend, support or host a ThingsCamp.

ThingsCamp 3

ThingsCamp 3 will be our biggest yet: in addition to the main day on April 8th we’ll be hosting an open learning event at St. Paul’s Learning Centre on Friday April 7th from 2-5pm and #thingsdrinks on the Friday evening.
